isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 35 below for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle is equipped with manually operated door windows, remove hex socket head mach. screw (Item 1) and remove window regulator handle and washer (Item 2). Save for reinstallation.

Remove cab door lower trim panel (Item 3) by removing seven pan head torx screws (Item 4) around outer edge of cab door lower trim panel and hold it away from cab door enough to disconnect courtesy light cable connector (Item 5) from wiring harness courtesy light connector (Item 6) inside cab door. Lay cab door lower trim panel out of the way where it will not be damaged.

figure.caption: Figure 35. Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX SOCKET HEAD MACH. SCREWS, 10-24 x 5/8

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 below for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle is equipped with manually operated door windows, remove hex socket head mach. screw (Item 1) and remove window regulator handle and washer (Item 2). Save for reinstallation.
Remove four mounting screws (Item 3) securing passenger door inner view glass assembly (Item 4) to cab door lower trim panel (Item 5). Save for reinstallation.

Remove cab door lower trim panel (Item 5) by removing seven pan head torx screws (Item 6) around outer edge of cab door lower trim panel and hold it away from cab door enough to disconnect courtesy light cable connector (Item 7) from wiring harness courtesy light connector (Item 8) inside cab door. Lay cab door lower trim panel out of the way where it will not be damaged.

figure.caption: Figure 36. Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX SOCKET HEAD MACH. SCREWS, 10-24 x 5/8
4. PASSENGER DOOR INNER VIEW GLASS ASSEMBLY
